description: Erection of a rear extension at first floor level, over part of the existing two storey back addition; re-sizing and replacement of an existing rooflight, on top of the main flat roof at roof level; installation of 3no. rooflights in the front roofslope; installation of new double glazed windows throughout; installation of an enlarged rooflight to replace existing, on top of the flat roof of existing four storey back addition; erection of new metal railings around the remaining perimeter of first floor back addition; further excavation of the front garden, in connection with the formation of a plant room; alterations to the front lightwell to include, erection of new external staircases following the removal of existing, re-sizing and replacement of existing door and windows to the front elevation, and installation of a new door and a window to the side elevation following the removal of existing door; replacement of existing front boundary wall railings; alterations to fenestration to the rear elevation at ground and lower ground floor level to include, installation of new sliding doors and windows, alterations to existing balustrade, and erection of new external staircase following the removal of existing spiral staircase; re-sizing and replacement of an existing walk-on glass rooflight, and installation of a new walk-on glass rooflight on top of the flat roof of lower ground floor back addition; repositioning of external rear garden steps; landscaping of the front and rear gardens; erection of a single storey outbuilding in the rear garden, following the demolition of existing.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
